Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.0.4 Windows 7 32bit

Problem: Switching vessels causes the game to "crash" leaving a still image of where the vessel was at the time of the "crash." Note: The game does not actually "crash." I can still access the space center, but when i go to the tracking station, I get the attached image.

Mods Installed: 

See image of mod folders

[http://imgur.com/UHz8R3j,y5AmUTC,HQTWA8g#1](http://imgur.com/UHz8R3j,y5AmUTC,HQTWA8g#1)

Reproduction Steps: 

Build a rocket and get it into space.

While in space, go into map view and switch to another vessel.

Vessel disappears while nav ball has the retrograde marker over the radial marker. [http://imgur.com/UHz8R3j,y5AmUTC,HQTWA8g#0](http://imgur.com/UHz8R3j,y5AmUTC,HQTWA8g#0)

Press escape to go into menu. 

Go to space center and tracking station. 

Get attached image. [http://imgur.com/UHz8R3j,y5AmUTC,HQTWA8g#2](http://imgur.com/UHz8R3j,y5AmUTC,HQTWA8g#2)

Second method: Press F9 to revert quicksave. Same thing happens. 

Log: 

I don't actually have a log as the game does not officially crash, just the UI gets destroyed as does the image of the vessel. The vessel is still present in the tracking station.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-12T16:56:16Z" title="07/12/2015 04:56  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 12, 2015</time> by jacksonflats**
  
New solution

Hi!

I got same error. Reinstalled game and got like 4 hours without it, now its all over again.

So its not a solution. Alt+ F2 spams NullReferenceException

I got a number of same modes as you

Remote Tech 

EVE

KIS

KAS

USI

Firespiter
